Toll Brothers 3Q Profit Doubles as Revenue Climbs5:18 pm ET August 24, 2021 (Dow Jones) Print By Kimberly Chin Toll Brothers Inc. said third-quarter profit more than doubled, driven by an increase in revenue as low mortgage rates and a dearth of housing continued to support home buying.The luxury homebuilder's profit was $234.9 million for the three-month period ended July 31, up from $114.8 million in last year's second quarter. Per-share earnings were $1.87, compared with 90 cents a year earlier, beating analysts' consensus estimates of $1.54 a share.
